document_name: PRODOC Poverty Reduction Support Programme 6th-CP PSD.pdf

outputs.output_descr: In 2008, following the substantive revision of the project document on the Niger-Delta Job Creation ad Conflict Prevention Initiative,  also referred to as Youth Empowerment Programme (YEP). The is jointly funded by the Delta State Government, the Shell Petroleum Development Company of Nigeria (SPDC) and the United Nations Development Programme (UNDP) and implemented by United Nations Project Services (UNOPS). The main objective of the project is to promote human security and sustainable development using youth empowerment, job creation and conflict prevention initiatives in the Niger Delta states of Nigeria

project_descr: The programme is designed to support national efforts aimed at reducing poverty levels so as to improve the quality of life of Nigerians through strategic, well coordinated pro-poor policy initiatives.
